1.12.2.1.2.3.1: Cygnus, finally, is documented. As well as some Cygnus usability tweaks and changes. Alpha quality.
1.12.2.1.2.3: Fix crash with Tool Progression and other mods that need to grab the harvest tool of the decorative piece blocks
1.12.2.1.2.0: Internal reorganizations, and a new Frame Screw item!
1.12.2.1.1.4: Fix Cygnus networks instantly crashing on servers and another IR crash. Sorry about that!
1.12.2.1.1.3: Fix a crash bug with InfraRedstone
1.12.2.1.1.2: Add slab and stair variants for decorative blocks, new sounds for the Unstable Cube, and some other things!
1.12.2.1.1.0: The Soul Coreverhaul. Also: new soulcore, new decorative blocks, Cygnus items are craftable, bug fixes, stuff like that you know?
1.12.2.1.0.4: Prerelease for 1.1. Lots of bugfixes and tweaks, new art, the return of the Unstable Cube, new Red String Liar, and the beta for the Cygnus Network, a corporea-flavored math and logic system
1.12.2.1.0.2: Fix the retainer comparator tweak not working, fix alchemy catalysts acting as trash cans
1.12.2.1.0.1: Fix a startup crash outside of dev environment, whoops
